title: Geneberg LHD gear shifter -SOLD subject to Payment

posts.content:
60-mid 1966 bus shifter. Fits chassis number 501707 through 216-028-111. NOTE: 1966 is a split model year so check your VIN number.
Geneberg LHD shifter Model GB 6748 with aluminium that handle with Geneberg logo and reverse thumb button. This was fitted to my bus but I need shifter for later model bus never driven with this shifter so as we.
If photo required please PM me with email address and I will send direct.
Price 230 inc postage
